name: tap-tempo
title: Tap Tempo
description: Measure the tempo (BPM) of music by tapping your keyboard to the beat.
author: kyrregjerstad

commands.name: tap
commands.title: Tap Tempo
commands.description: Tap any key to the beat...

preferences.name: decimalPlaces
preferences.title: Decimal Places
preferences.description: Number of decimal places to show in BPM

preferences.name: smoothingFactor
preferences.title: Smoothing
preferences.description: How much to smooth BPM values

preferences.name: tempoChangeThreshold
preferences.title: Tempo Change Sensitivity
preferences.description: How sensitive the app is to tempo changes

preferences.name: pauseThreshold
preferences.title: Pause Duration
preferences.description: How long of a pause indicates a potential tempo change

preferences.label: Reset After Pause
preferences.name: resetAfterPause
preferences.title: Reset After Pause
preferences.description: Whether to reset calculations after a long pause

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
